§ 1313. Limitation on payments(a) No institutions of higher education may receive more than $4,000,000 for the construction of its coal research laboratory, including initially installed fixed equipment, nor may it receive more than $1,500,000 for initially installed movable equipment, nor may it receive more than $500,000 for new program startup expenses.
(b) No institution of higher education may receive more than $1,500,000 per year from the Federal Government for operating expenses.
